roleset.name: not to be believed
roleset.note: UNBELIEVABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, believe.01. (from unbelievable.01-j)

role.descr: thing not able to be believed

example.name: arg 1, LOC
example.text: He was UNbelievable in his role, had the STUPIDEST accent, can't even do redneck right, looked like 40 hells, and really added NOTHING to the role.

roleset.name: over the top, perhaps with skill
roleset.note: UNBELIEVABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from unbelievable.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: I was unbelievable as a striker! I'm joking but I did score a LOT of goals.

example.name: really really great
example.text: Oh my goodness, this pie is unbelievable!
